actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.
Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1181.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to make the duty on plastic netting approximately equal to the duty now charged on the raw plastic from which the netting is made 10 percent plus 1.5 cents per pound.

summary.text: (Reported to House from the Committee on Ways and Means with amendment, H. Rept. 96-1181) Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to increase the duty on rubber or plastic netting.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States in order to make the duty on plastic netting approximately equal to the duty now charged on the raw plastic from which the netting is made 10 percent plus 1.5 cents per pound.
